mapper.sql: t.id, t.queue_name, t.invoke_request, t.effect_time, t.status, t.retry_count
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xxlmq_queue_message(queue_name, invoke_request, effect_time, status, retry_count) VALUES(#{queueName}, #{invokeRequest}, #{effectTime}, #{status}, #{retryCount})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM xxlmq_queue_message AS t ORDER BY t.id desc LIMIT #{pagesize}
mapper.update: UPDATE xxlmq_queue_message SET retry_count = retry_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} and retry_count - 1 >= 0
